info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 2:28PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Otsego, southeastern Madison and northeastern Chenango Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 228 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brookfield, or 8 miles southeast of Hamilton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brookfield, Edmeston, Poolville, South Brookfield, Leonardsville, Hubbardsville, South Edmeston and Lambs Corners. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central New York.
